snippet: A friend of accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev pleaded guilty on Thursday to charges of hindering the investigation into the blasts in a deal with prosecutors that calls for a prison sentence of up to seven years....

headline.print_headline: Friend of Boston Bomb Suspect May Get Seven-Year Term in Plea Deal
headline.main: Friend of Boston Bomb Suspect May Get Seven-Year Term in Plea Deal

lead_paragraph: A friend of accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev pleaded guilty on Thursday to charges of hindering the investigation into the blasts in a deal with prosecutors that calls for a prison sentence of up to seven years.
